price: Então, juro pelO Senhor dos Levantes e dos Poentes: somos Poderoso,
arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: falā uq'simu birabbi al-mashāriqi wal-maghāribi innā laqādirūna
